name: Ludum Dare 50 - Delay the Invasion HTML
name_original: Ludum Dare 50 - Delay the Invasion HTML
description: Goblins and Skeletons are approaching the village! We must stall them as long as possible. Luckily the crazy wizard Bardaky , left his magical crate behind. It spawns random magical plants. These can be used to hold off the invasion. Not sure what the plants do. But maybe you can find out?
